Title: Maryland Sport Venues - Basketball [Maryland]
Description: Maryland Sports (http://www.marylandsports.us/) has identified sport venues located within the State of Maryland. These venues offer opportunities to participate in free and fee-based, organized and pick-up, indoor and outdoor sports and physical fitness related activities in the area of Basketball.This is a MD iMAP hosted service layer. Find more information athttps://imap.maryland.gov.Feature Service Layer Link:https://geodata.md.gov/imap/rest/services/Society/MD_SportVenues/FeatureServer/4
Creator: Maryland Sports
